      • S4ClassificationClientImpl

        public S4ClassificationClientImpl(ServiceDescriptor item,
                                  String apiKey,
                                  String keySecret)
        Constructs a S4AnnotationClient for accessing a specific processing pipeline on the s4.ontotext.com platform using the given credentials.
        Parameters:
        item - the ServiceDescriptor which represents the processing pipeline which will be used
        apiKey - Your S4 API Key
        keySecret - Your S4 Key Secret

      • S4ClassificationClientImpl

        public S4ClassificationClientImpl(URL serviceURL,
                                  String apiKey,
                                  String keySecret)
        Constructs a S4AnnotationClient for accessing a specific processing pipeline on the s4.ontotext.com platform using the given credentials.
        Parameters:
        serviceURL - The service endpoint URL
        apiKey - Your S4 API Key
        keySecret - Your S4 Key Secret

    • Method Detail

      • classifyDocument

        public ClassifiedDocument classifyDocument(String documentText,
                                           SupportedMimeType documentMimeType)
                                    throws S4ServiceClientException
        Classifies a single document with the specified MIME type. Returns an object which allows for convenient access to the classification information of the document.
        Specified by:
        classifyDocument in interface S4ClassificationClient
        Parameters:
        documentText - the document content to classify
        documentMimeType - the MIME type of the document which will be classified
        Returns:
        A ClassifiedDocument containing the original content as well as the classifications produced
        Throws:
        S4ServiceClientException - Error

                                           Charset documentEncoding,
                                           SupportedMimeType documentMimeType)
                                    throws IOException,
                                           S4ServiceClientException
        Classifies the contents of a single file with the specified MIME type. Returns an object which allows for convenient access to the classification information for the document.
        Specified by:
        classifyDocument in interface S4ClassificationClient
        Parameters:
        documentFile - the file whose contents will be classified

      • classifyDocument

        public ClassifiedDocument classifyDocument(URL documentUrl,
                                           SupportedMimeType documentMimeType)
                                    throws S4ServiceClientException
        Classifies a single document publicly available under a given URL. Returns an object which allows for convenient access to the classifications in the classified document
        Specified by:
        classifyDocument in interface S4ClassificationClient
        Parameters:
        documentUrl - the publicly accessible URL from where the document will be downloaded
        documentMimeType - the MIME type of the document which will be classified
        Returns:
        A ClassifiedDocument which allows for convenient programmatic access to the classified document
        Throws:
        S4ServiceClientException - Error

        Throws:
